resources.string:
The button below shows how to link to song lyrics from within the app.
 If the lyrics plugin is already installed, pressing the button will show the lyrics.
 If the plugin is not yet installed, the user is directed to the download page.
 The lyrics plugin also monitors on-device player and scrobbling activities, displaying a notification everytime a lyrics is identified.
Press the button below to show the lyrics for the song "Let it be" by The Beatles
